org.prebake.fs
Class FileVersioner

java.lang.Object
  org.prebake.fs.FileVersioner
Direct Known Subclasses:
DbFileVersioner
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public abstract class FileVersioner
extends java.lang.Object

As files changes, maintains a table of file hashes, and invalidates non-file artifacts such as the toolbox, and dependency graph.

makeArtifactUpdateLoop

protected abstract FileVersioner.ArtifactUpdateLoop makeArtifactUpdateLoop()

updateArtifact

public <X,T extends NonFileArtifact<X>> boolean updateArtifact(ArtifactAddresser<T> as,
                                                               T artifact,
                                                               @Nullable
                                                               X value,
                                                               java.util.Collection<java.nio.file.Path> prerequisites,
                                                               Hash prereqHash)
Checks that the files that an artifact depends on are still valid before marking that artifact valid and recording the prerequisites so that the artifact can be invalidated should any of the prerequisites subsequently change.

Parameters:
as - the address space for item.
artifact - a newly valid non file artifact that was derived from prerequisites.
value - passed to NonFileArtifact.validate(T) if the artifact can indeed be validated.
prerequisites - the files on which item depends.
prereqHash - the hash of prerequisites at the time artifact was derived from them.
Returns:
true if item is really valid -- if its hash is up-to-date. If false, then one or more of the prerequisites has changed since artifact was derived.

close

public abstract void close()
